column5: Hi all,  Every summer we rent a cottage on Balsam lake owned by my wife's co-worker for a week in July. Nice place with all the amenities, and close to a little honey hole i've discovered that's done well for us over the last few years. Great lake for my little 14'.  Want to consider changing it up this year - try a new area, new lake, etc... Am willing to drive anywhere from 1.5 - 3 hours in any direction.  Anyone here have a cottage available for rent in July, on a 'good' fishing lake? Or can you suggest a good resource to use to find one?  d
cottagelink.com or northerncomfort.com has all the choice you need.
